name: Reapers-battleship
tagline: A simply game written in C++.
body:
# How this project started:

I started learning C++, so I decided to create a simple game.
The result is very good for a new developer and I will keep updating this game
with everything new I learn in C++.

I hope you like it.

Report any bug here [Issues Page](https://github.com/Reap3RGHS/Reapers-Battleship/issues)

# Download:

To download this project you must clone it using this command : 
* git clone https://github.com/Reap3RGHS/Reapers-Battleship

Contact with Reap3RGHS : reaperghs@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
